name: Unititled Pong Game
description:
CONTROLS:

Pong Movement  -    Up Down Arrow

Tilt the Ball  -  Space

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

A multiplier (single player for now since no time XD) game which is mix between Peggle and Pong games. 

You have to hit all the peggles with your partner (which for now computer) to complete the level and go to a new level.

*NOTICE: due to last minute submission found a glitch where even after you complete the level by finishing all the peggles it will not go to new levels, so added the other levels as screenshots.

Simple , funny teamwork game with the possibilities of future improvement, so your review will be much appreciated..

Made by: XOiRD

Idea: came from being lazy.
